resources.string: The Gaslands Builder was created because I wanted to learn how to write Android apps. Its source code is open on GitHub. I had great fun with it and it is highly possible that the app will develop. But since most of the time I am focused on family life and my PhD in chemistry the development may take awhile.

If you like the app, find it useful and want to support and encourage my efforts click the Support button on top. I would appreciate stars and watchers on my GitHub account. You may also provide me a cup of coffee.
